task_description:
# NPS and Feedback Collection System

Integrated NPS surveys and feedback collection. Triggered at key moments (after first successful deployment, monthly, after issues resolved). Data feeds into product improvement.

## Rationale
Essential for understanding user satisfaction and identifying issues. NPS is a success metric in product vision. Enables data-driven prioritization of features.

## User Stories
- As a product manager, I want to collect NPS so that I can measure user satisfaction over time
- As a user, I want to provide feedback easily so that the product improves based on my needs

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] NPS survey appears at key moments (configurable triggers)
- [ ] Simple 0-10 score with optional comment
- [ ] Non-intrusive: easy to dismiss, rate limits on frequency
- [ ] Dashboard for admin to view NPS trends
- [ ] Follow-up mechanism for detractors (score 0-6)
